name: WTF Wars Dungeon Edition template for GDevelop 5
name_original: WTF Wars Dungeon Edition template for GDevelop 5
description:
WTF Wars Dungeon Edition template for GDevelop 5


Use AWSD or Arrows to move.

Mouse: Right click to switch between heroes. Left click to shoot or attack.

Debug: Return to restart anytime.

Created on GDevelop beta 117
